text: Saam Daam Dand Bhed is India's political drama TV serial. The show is basically genre of revenge drama with political flair in it. The storyline of the show is loosely inspired from Netflix mega show House of Cards. It is produced by Shakuntalam Telefilms. The show went on air on August 28, 2017 on Star Bharat. == References == Category:Hindi-language television series Category:2017 Indian television series debuts
title: Saam Daam Dand Bhed (TV Series)
